originalText.text: Charles is a very mediocre lawyer, you might as well get a public defendant. Thats my honest assessment of charles "law skills." He will not fight for you as a lawyer should, instead he accepts ANY plea deal from the prosecutor and then strong arms you to take it because thats as far as his lawyer skills will take you. DO NOT RISK YOUR FREEDOM OR MONEY WITH CHARLES.

originalText.text: Handled a Gun case in NY 2015, was very budget friendly. I’d recommend him as my family appreciated all the works and efforts he provided for this case.

text.text: Handled a Gun case in NY 2015, was very budget friendly. I’d recommend him as my family appreciated all the works and efforts he provided for this case.

originalText.text: I was definitely skeptical about this lawyer due to the fact that when you read these google reviews some of the most recent ones are not so great, because of that I was very skeptical of working with mr. miller. Mr  Miller has definitely proved otherwise. He’s actually a very great lawyer. he traveled all the way from NYC to Sullivan County  where I had caught my case. And above all he will work with you if your on a budget. He’s a great guy to work with. I couldn’t of asked for a better lawyer.

originalText.text: Its has been 6 years since Mr Charles helped me with my 12 charges 3 of them was felony  all got dismissed and was out of jail he even drove me to my home at midnight from jail :))) 2015 he helped with child visitation 2017 child support issues and recently he helped with my child custody and divorce all this years he was there for me any time I had question or problems he is my go to Lawyer with excellent knowledge he is very professional and gives great advice and most importantly gets job done in favor of clients. Thank you so much wish you all the best.

originalText.text: If I could give this man a negative review I would. I should have known he was a horrible lawyer when he was contacted by a family member of mine, he decided to disclose personal information to her about a past case, how could you tell a complete stranger details about a persons record without even having confirmation of the relationship between two people? And if so, what lawyer just blabbers to someone who he KNOWS is not his client. Anyway I was so stress I went with him anyway at which point he decided to not look into my case, he urged me to take a plea for something I did not do, he harassed me for months went as far as saying I needed mental evaluation and that I should seek medical treatment, yes this “lawyer” turned into a doctor. I ended up cursing him out never heard from this scumbag again, my case ended up getting dismissed although he assured me that I did not “want to go up against the justice system.” This case has been closed for over a year but I still have nightmares of not the case itself but the evil money hungry greedy lying unprofessional bastard that is Charles Miller. You’re way better off with a public defender, which by the way he is, during one of my court hearings I asked another one of his clients about him and she told me he was her damn public defender. Please do not give this terrible person a penny.
